explains: n. 送信人，邮递员，报信者；（体内传递信息和刺激的）信使；<古>先驱
wordGroup: msn messenger 微软即时通讯软件
messenger wire 承力吊索；电缆吊线

sentences.en: The messenger bent and scratched at his knee where the strapping chafed.
sentences.cn: 信使弯身挠膝盖上被带子擦痛的地方。

sentences.en: There will be a messenger at the airport to collect the photographs from our courier.
sentences.cn: 机场会有一名信使从我们的快递员那儿取走照片。

sentences.en: Messenger will explore the surface of Mercury, its crust, its atmosphere and even its magnetic field.
sentences.cn: “信使号”将探索水星的表面、地壳、大气，甚至其磁场。
